flawed_nl_solution:
Miles will read for 4 hours because 24 x (1/6) = <<24*1/6=4>>4
He will read each type for 3/4 hours because 4 / 3 = 3/4
He will read 63/4 pages of novels because 21 x (3/4) = 63/4
He will read 45/2 pages of graphic novels because 30 x (3/4) = 45/2
He will read 135/4 pages of comic books because 45 x (3/4) = 135/4
He will read 72 pages in total because 63/4 + 45/2 + 135/4 = <<63/4+45/2+135/4=72>>72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4/3, not 3/4. It appears the numerator and denominator were swapped.
